padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1209209" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanyaling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/25559"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanyaling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Bigarade-Concentree-4770.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4770.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bigarade Concentree"title="Bigarade Concentree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1209209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1209209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/25559">tanyaling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-08">08/08/20 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the hyacinths that wasn't so good to me. It was quite realistic but a bit too weird for me, because of some chemical note. <br />
<br />
I REALLY wanted to love it but sadly, I couldn't. It was my first niche perfume I bought with my early pay checks and I bought it blind. Then of course since it is a niche I tried to pretend and convince myself I liked it all through half a bottle, but really.... after half a bottle you cannot lie to yourself anymore. <br />
<br />
In the end I sold it to a nice lady who was so happy and said she loved it. <br />
<br />
I am actually not sure how bluebells smell like but dont think I have that here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4535"comment_id="1209209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Bluebell-4535.html?ccid=1209209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1054754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1054754" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wednesdaychild41"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wednesdaychild41" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Papillon-Artisan-Perfumes/Epona-95954.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95954.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Epona"title="Epona"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1054754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1054754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239">Wednesdaychild41</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-26">04/26/19 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>. . . No<br />
<br />
Don't like it. It honestly reminds me of a damp dusty dirty bathroom that has been sprayed with a cheap floral toilet spray.<br />
<br />
You do get the bluebell/ hyacinth note on the first spray and it starts out a delicate floral. . But on me it quicky turned into the negative description above.<br />
<br />
I so wanted to love this, as I love bluebells, and honestly the bottle shouts Alice in Wonderland which I love. <br />
<br />
But it's a thumbs down unfortunately</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4535"comment_id="1054754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Bluebell-4535.html?ccid=1054754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent696200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc696200" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="milazinha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.860474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="milazinha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma696200ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd696200" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860474">milazinha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-13">04/13/16 13:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(If anyone would like to try this, I'm happy to swap decants  for my want list.)<br />
<br />
I sell decants of this elsewhere, and it's one of my bestsellers. Yet, I don't get it. I don't like Bluebell. I *love* the bottle and the color, but the scent is awful to me; too flowery/green and harsh. No sweetness in this. Do people like it because it was Princess Di's favorite? Or because it's flowers on crack? The one good thing I can say is this: this is a UNIQUE scent. You won't find anything similar. Silage and longevity are out of this world, too. If you enter a room wearing this, believe me: you will be noticed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4535"comment_id="696200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Bluebell-4535.html?ccid=696200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent978490" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc978490" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="breatheme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="breatheme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juicy-Couture/Eau-de-Couture-3781.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3781.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Couture"title="Eau de Couture"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma978490ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd978490" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145959">breatheme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-04">09/04/18 02:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Only tested it instore.<br />
<br />
It starts off very sharp and synthetic green to me and for me, even after an hour, it never really improves markedly. Sure it turned a little spicy-green but the extremely synthetic scent never went away. I actually felt nauseous from it!<br />
<br />
Interestingly, I wasn't able to remove ALL of it with makeup remover and sprayed a fairly generic perfume on top (DKNY Be Delicious) to see if I could disguise it. The two scents actually blended together very nicely (DKNY BD is usually a bit boring for me but Bluebell added an interesting powdery-green base??)<br />
<br />
This IS a very expensive perfume though, so using it solely as a layering perfume might seem a bit wasteful. If you bought blindly and dislike it, perhaps layering it over a more "generic" fruity/sweet perfume you're trying to get rid of will create a very interesting and unique blend.<br />
<br />
If you're thinking of it, try it on your skin before proceeding.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4535"comment_id="978490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Bluebell-4535.html?ccid=978490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent862793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc862793" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Annabear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039259"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1039259.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Annabear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfum-d-Empire/Eau-Suave-5625.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5625.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Suave"title="Eau Suave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma862793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd862793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039259">Annabear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-19">09/19/17 20:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An earlier reviewer stated that this may make you feel nauseated at first - spot on. Another reviewer thought it had a stale water in a floral vase vibe...also spot on. I don't like this at all, it smells damp to me, it has a musty, shoe cupboard that needs serious airing feel to the mustiness. A win for one of my daughters who may enjoy it far more than I do.<br />
A disappointment because I have a lot of wonderful Penhaligon fragrances.<br />
Not a safe blind buy, please test this before committing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4535"comment_id="862793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Bluebell-4535.html?ccid=862793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="4535" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="4535":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="4535" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>

        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

        </span>
    </div>

    </div>

    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });

</script>
